TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TextRunTypographyProperties extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供抽象類別給支援 物件的印刷樣式屬性。

span.span: Provides an abstract class for supporting typography properties for objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文字配置用戶端會使用類別來產生一組 OpenType 版面配置引擎所處理的功能。The text layout client uses the class to generate a set of features that are processed by the OpenType layout engine.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property AnnotationAlternates As Integer
public: abstract property int AnnotationAlternates { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得替代附註型態的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of an alternate annotation form.
The index of the alternate annotation form.
The default is 0 (zero).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註釋形式包含圖像 （glyph） 放置在開啟或實心圓、 正方形、 括號、 diamonds、 或圓角的方塊。Annotation forms include glyphs placed in open or solid circles, squares, parentheses, diamonds, or rounded boxes. 如果值大於 0 與所選取的字型不支援註釋的替代項目時，會顯示字母的預設表單。If the value of is greater than 0 and the selected font does not support annotation alternates, the default form of the letter is displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Capitals As FontCapitals
public: abstract property System::Windows::FontCapitals Capitals { System::Windows::FontCapitals get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示所選取字型的大寫字母型態。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the capital form of the selected font.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大寫字是一組以大寫樣式字符轉譯文字的印刷格式。Capitals are a set of typographical forms that render text in capital-styled glyphs. 一般而言，當文字全部轉譯為大寫時，字母之間的間距可能太近，字母的加權和比例會過重。Typically, when text is rendered as all capitals, the spacing between letters can appear too tight, and the weight and proportion of the letters too heavy. OpenType 支援大寫字，包括小型大寫字、 特小大寫字、 標題和大寫字母間距數目樣式格式。OpenType supports a number of styling formats for capitals, including small capitals, petite capitals, titling, and capital spacing. 這些樣式格式可讓您控制大寫字的外觀。These styling formats allow you to control the appearance of capitals. 下列文字顯示 Pescadero 字型的標準大寫字母，後面接著樣式設定為 "SmallCaps" 和 "AllSmallCaps" 的字母。The following text displays standard capital letters for the Pescadero font, followed by the letters styled as "SmallCaps" and "AllSmallCaps". 在此情況下，三個單字全都使用相同的字型大小。In this case, the same font size is used for all three words. ![使用 OpenType 大寫的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont11.gif "使用 OpenType 大寫的文字")![Text using OpenType capitals](~/add/media/opentypefont11.gif "Text using OpenType capitals") 大寫字的範例Example of capitals

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property CapitalSpacing As Boolean
public: abstract property bool CapitalSpacing { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值會表示全大寫字母文字的內部圖像間距是否要進行全面調整，以提高可讀性。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether inter-glyph spacing for all-capital text is globally adjusted to improve readability.

value.span: 如果調整間距則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if spacing is adjusted; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大寫字母間距功能可讓您在全部使用大寫字的文字中，提供更多的間距。Capital spacing is a feature that allows you to provide more spacing when using all capitals in text. 大寫字母通常會設計為與小寫字母混合在一起。Capital letters are typically designed to blend with lowercase letters. 大寫字母和小寫字母間看起來很不錯的間距，在全部使用大寫字母時會看起來很擠。Spacing that appears attractive between and a capital letter and a lowercase letter may look too tight when all capital letters are used. 下列文字顯示 Pescadero 字型的正常和大寫字間距。The following text displays normal and capital spacing for the Pescadero font. ![使用 opentype 大寫留空的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont21.gif "使用 opentype 大寫留空的文字")![Text using OpenType capital spacing](~/add/media/opentypefont21.gif "Text using OpenType capital spacing") 範例中的正常和大寫字母間距Example of normal and capital spacing

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property CaseSensitiveForms As Boolean
public: abstract property bool CaseSensitiveForms { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值會表示圖像是否調整其垂直位置，而更能與大寫字母圖像對齊。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether glyphs adjust their vertical position to better align with uppercase glyphs.

value.span: 如果調整垂直位置則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the vertical position is adjusted; otherwise, .
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ContextualAlternates As Boolean
public: abstract property bool ContextualAlternates { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值會表示是否可以根據所要呈現之文字的內容使用自訂圖像型態。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether custom glyph forms can be used based upon the context of the text being rendered.

value.span: 如果可以使用自訂圖像形式則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if custom glyph forms can be used; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 隨機內容替代項目提供單一字元的多個替代字符。Random contextual alternates provide multiple substitute glyphs for a single character. 以書寫體字型實作時，這項功能可以使用一組隨機選擇的字符，在外觀上略加變動來模擬手寫。When implemented with script-type fonts, this feature can simulate handwriting by using of a set of randomly chosen glyphs with slight differences in appearance. 下列文字使用 Lindsey 字型的隨機內容替代項目。The following text uses random contextual alternates for the Lindsey font. 請注意，字母 "a" 的外觀略有不同。Notice that the letter "a" varies slightly in appearance ![使用 OpenType 隨機內容替代的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont23.gif "使用 OpenType 隨機內容替代文字")![Text using OpenType random contextual alternates](~/add/media/opentypefont23.gif "Text using OpenType random contextual alternates") 範例中的隨機內容替代項目Example of random contextual alternates

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ContextualLigatures As Boolean
public: abstract property bool ContextualLigatures { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值會表示是否啟用內容連字。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether contextual ligatures are enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用內容連字則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if contextual ligatures are enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內容連音符號旨在提供組成連音符號的字元間更好的聯結行為，以提升可讀性。Contextual ligatures are designed to enhance readability by providing better joining behavior between the characters that make up the ligature. 如果值是`true`和選取的字型不支援內容連字，字母的預設表單隨即出現。If the value of is `true` and the selected font does not support contextual ligatures, the default form of the letter is displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ContextualSwashes As Integer
public: abstract property int ContextualSwashes { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值會指定內容 Swash 型態的索引。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies the index of a contextual swashes form.

value.span: 標準 Swash 形式的索引。

span.span: The index of the standard swashes form.
The default is 0 (zero).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些花飾字字符的組合會導致不討喜的外觀，例如相鄰字母的伸尾部分重疊。Certain combinations of swash glyphs can cause an unattractive appearance, such as overlapping descenders on adjacent letters. 使用內容花飾字可讓您使用會產生更佳外觀的替代花飾字字符。Using a contextual swash allows you to use a substitute swash glyph that produces a better appearance. 下列文字顯示套用內容花飾字之前和之後的相同字組。The following text shows the same word before and after a contextual swash is applied. ![使用 OpenType 內容花飾字的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont19.gif "使用 OpenType 內容花飾字的文字")![Text using OpenType contextual swashes](~/add/media/opentypefont19.gif "Text using OpenType contextual swashes") 內容花飾字的範例Example of a contextual swash

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DiscretionaryLigatures As Boolean
public: abstract property bool DiscretionaryLigatures { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值會表示是否啟用判別連字。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether discretionary ligatures are enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用判別連字則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if discretionary ligatures are enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Discretionary 連音符號都是設計成裝飾之用，而不是專門為了方便閱讀。Discretionary ligatures are designed to be ornamental and are not specifically designed for readability. 下列文字顯示 Pericles 字型 Discretionary 連音符號。The following text displays discretionary ligature glyphs for the Pericles font. ![使用 OpenType discretionary 連音符號的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont05.gif "使用 OpenType discretionary 連音符號的文字")![Text using OpenType discretionary ligatures](~/add/media/opentypefont05.gif "Text using OpenType discretionary ligatures") Discretionary 連音符號集的範例Example of discretionary set of ligatures

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property EastAsianExpertForms As Boolean
public: abstract property bool EastAsianExpertForms { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值會表示標準日文字型型態是否已替換成對應的慣用印刷樣式型態。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the standard Japanese font forms have been replaced with the corresponding preferred typographic forms.

value.span: 如果標準日文字型形式已替換成對應的慣用印刷樣式形式則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if standard Japanese font forms have been replaced with the corresponding preferred typographic forms; otherwise, .
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property EastAsianLanguage As FontEastAsianLanguage
public: abstract property System::Windows::FontEastAsianLanguage EastAsianLanguage { System::Windows::FontEastAsianLanguage get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示要用於特定書寫系統或語言的圖像版本。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the version of glyphs to be used for a specific writing system or language.
One of the values.
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property EastAsianWidths As FontEastAsianWidths
public: abstract property System::Windows::FontEastAsianWidths EastAsianWidths { System::Windows::FontEastAsianWidths get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示要對東亞字型中的拉丁字元使用的比例寬度。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the proportional width to be used for Latin characters in an East Asian font.
One of the values.
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Fraction As FontFraction
public: abstract property System::Windows::FontFraction Fraction { System::Windows::FontFraction get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示分數樣式。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the fraction style.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks OpenType 字型支援分數，包括斜式和堆疊的樣式。OpenType fonts support styles for fractions, including slashed and stacked. 下列文字顯示 Palatino Linotype 字型的分數樣式。The following text displays fraction styles for the Palatino Linotype font. ![使用 OpenType 斜式和直式分數](~/add/media/opentypefont12.gif "文字使用 OpenType 斜式和直式分數")![Text using OpenType slashed and stacked fractions](~/add/media/opentypefont12.gif "Text using OpenType slashed and stacked fractions") 加斜線的零數和直式分數樣式的範例Example of slashed and stacked fraction styles

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property HistoricalForms As Boolean
public: abstract property bool HistoricalForms { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示是否啟用歷史型態。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether historical forms are enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用歷史形式則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if historical forms are enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 古體形式是過去常用的印刷樣式慣例。Historical forms are typographic conventions that were common in the past. 顯示"Boston，Massachusetts"片語的下列文字使用 Palatino Linotype 字型的字符的歷程記錄形式。The following text displays the phrase "Boston, Massachusetts" using an historical form of glyphs for the Palatino Linotype font. ![使用 opentype 古體形式的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont10.gif "使用 opentype 古體形式的文字")![Text using OpenType historical forms](~/add/media/opentypefont10.gif "Text using OpenType historical forms") 古體形式的範例Example of historical forms

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property HistoricalLigatures As Boolean
public: abstract property bool HistoricalLigatures { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示是否啟用歷史連字。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether historical ligatures are enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用歷史連字則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if historical ligatures are enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 過往連音符號是歷程記錄的印刷樣式字型設計者可能會新增至其字型中所使用的印刷樣式形式。Historical ligatures are typographic forms used in historical typography that font designers may add to their fonts.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Kerning As Boolean
public: abstract property bool Kerning { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示是否啟用字元間距調整。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether kerning is enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用字元間距調整則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if kerning is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字元間距調整是調整來增強 word 圖形的字元間距的印刷樣式函式。Kerning is a typographic function that adjusts the spacing between characters to enhance word shape.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property MathematicalGreek As Boolean
public: abstract property bool MathematicalGreek { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示希臘文圖像的標準印刷字型型態是否已替換成在數學標記法中常用的對應字型型態。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether standard typographic font forms of Greek glyphs have been replaced with corresponding font forms commonly used in mathematical notation.

value.span: 如果啟用數學希臘文形式則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if mathematical Greek forms are enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值是`true`和選取的字型不支援數學希臘文形式，字母的預設表單隨即出現。If the value of is `true` and the selected font does not support mathematical Greek forms, the default form of the letter is displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property NumeralAlignment As FontNumeralAlignment
public: abstract property System::Windows::FontNumeralAlignment NumeralAlignment { System::Windows::FontNumeralAlignment get(); };

summary.span: 使用數字時取得寬度對齊。

span.span: Gets the alignment of widths when using numerals.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks OpenType 字型支援的調和間距與表格式數項功能，使用數字時，控制寬度對齊。OpenType fonts support a proportional and tabular figure feature to control the alignment of widths when using numerals. 調和間距數字會將每一個數字視為具有不同的寬度，"1" 比 "5" 窄。Proportional figures treat each numeral as having a different width—"1" is narrower than "5". 表格式數字會被視為等寬數字，以便垂直對齊，進而提高可讀性的數值資訊。Tabular figures are treated as equal-width numerals so that they align vertically, which increases the readability of numerical information. 下列文字在第一個資料行中顯示使用 Miramonte 字型的兩個調和間距數字。The following text displays two proportional figures in the first column using the Miramonte font. 請注意數字 "5" 和 "1" 之間的寬度差異。Note the difference in width between the numerals "5" and "1". 第二個資料行顯示相同的兩個數值，使用表格式數字功能調整其寬度。The second column shows the same two numeric values with the widths adjusted by using the tabular figure feature. ![使用 OpenType 調和間距與表格式數字的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont22.gif "使用 OpenType 調和間距與表格式數字的文字")![Text using OpenType proportional & tabular figures](~/add/media/opentypefont22.gif "Text using OpenType proportional & tabular figures") 調和間距與索引標籤式的數字的範例Example of proportional and tabbed figures

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property NumeralStyle As FontNumeralStyle
public: abstract property System::Windows::FontNumeralStyle NumeralStyle { System::Windows::FontNumeralStyle get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值會表示用來呈現數值替代字型型態的圖像集。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the set of glyphs that are used to render numeric alternate font forms.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks OpenType 字型支援舊樣式數字格式。OpenType fonts support an old-style numeral format. 此格式適用於顯示樣式不再標準的數字。This format is useful for displaying numerals in styles that are no longer standard. 下列文字顯示 Palatino Linotype 字型的標準和舊樣式數字格式中的 18 世紀的日期。The following text displays an 18th-century date in standard and old-style numeral formats for the Palatino Linotype font. ![使用 OpenType 舊樣式數字的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont24.gif "使用 OpenType 舊樣式數字的文字")![Text using OpenType old style numerals](~/add/media/opentypefont24.gif "Text using OpenType old style numerals") 標準和舊樣式數字的範例Example of standard and old-style numerals 下列文字顯示 Palatino Linotype 字型，後面接著舊樣式數字的標準數字。The following text displays standard numerals for the Palatino Linotype font, followed by old-style numerals. ![使用 OpenType 舊樣式數字集的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont13.gif "使用 OpenType 舊樣式數字集的文字")![Text using OpenType old style numeral sets](~/add/media/opentypefont13.gif "Text using OpenType old style numeral sets") 標準和舊樣式數字集的範例Example of standard and old-style numeral sets

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void OnPropertiesChanged() cil managed

summary.span: 當 屬性變更其值時，便會修正 衍生類別的內部狀態。

span.span: Corrects internal state for a derived class whenever any property changes its value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法的 set 存取子從屬性覆寫時，如果值變更為 set 存取子的一部分。Call this method from set accessors of a property override, if the value changes as part of the setter.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property SlashedZero As Boolean
public: abstract property bool SlashedZero { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示表面上的零字型型態是否應該替換成斜線零。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a nominal zero font form should be replaced with a slashed zero.

value.span: 如果啟用斜線零形式則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if slashed zero forms are enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks OpenType 字型支援加斜線的零數字格式，以強調字母"O"與數字"0"之間的差異。OpenType fonts support a slashed zero numeral format to emphasize the difference between the letter "O" and the numeral "0". 加斜線的零數字通常用於財務和商務資訊中的識別碼。The slashed zero numeral is often used for identifiers in financial and business information. 下列文字顯示使用 Miramonte 字型的範例訂單識別碼。The following text displays a sample order identifier using the Miramonte font. 第一行使用標準的數字。The first line uses standard numerals. 第二行使用加斜線的零數字，以突顯與大寫字母 "O" 的對比。The second line used slashed zero numerals to provide better contrast with the uppercase "O" letter. ![使用 OpenType 斜式零的數字](~/add/media/opentypefont17.gif "文字使用 OpenType 斜式零的數字")![Text using OpenType slashed zero numerals](~/add/media/opentypefont17.gif "Text using OpenType slashed zero numerals") 範例中的斜線零數字Example of slashed zero numerals 如果值是`true`和選取的字型不支援斜式零形式時，會顯示數字的預設表單。If the value of is `true` and the selected font does not support slashed zero forms, the default form of the numeral is displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property StandardLigatures As Boolean
public: abstract property bool StandardLigatures { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示是否啟用標準連字。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether standard ligatures are enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用標準連字則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if standard ligatures are enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列文字顯示 Pericles 字型的標準連音符號字符。The following text displays standard ligature glyphs for the Pericles font. ![使用 OpenType 標準連音符號的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont04.gif "使用 OpenType 標準連音符號的文字")![Text using OpenType standard ligatures](~/add/media/opentypefont04.gif "Text using OpenType standard ligatures") 一組標準連音符號的範例Example of a standard set of ligatures 根據預設，在 OpenType 字型[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]啟用標準連音符號。By default, OpenType fonts in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] enable standard ligatures. 例如，如果您使用 Palatino Linotype 字型，標準連音符號 "fi"、"ff" 和 "fl" 會顯示為合併的字元字符。For example, if you use the Palatino Linotype font, the standard ligatures "fi", "ff", and "fl" appear as a combined character glyph. 請注意，每個標準連音符號的字元會彼此相鄰。Notice that the characters of each standard ligature touch each other. ![使用 OpenType 標準連音符號的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont06.gif "使用 OpenType 標準連音符號的文字")![Text using OpenType standard ligatures](~/add/media/opentypefont06.gif "Text using OpenType standard ligatures") 依預設啟用的標準連音符號的範例Example of standard ligatures enabled by default 不過，您可以停用標準連音符號功能，讓 "ff" 等標準連音符號顯示為兩個分開的字符，而不是合併的字元字符。However, you can disable standard ligature features so that a standard ligature such as "ff" displays as two separate glyphs, rather than as a combined character glyph. ![文字使用已停用 OpenType 標準連音符號](~/add/media/opentypefont07.gif "文字使用已停用 OpenType 標準連音符號")![Text using disabled OpenType standard ligatures](~/add/media/opentypefont07.gif "Text using disabled OpenType standard ligatures") 已停用的標準連音符號的範例Example of disabled standard ligatures 如果值是`true`和選取的字型不支援標準連音符號，字母的預設表單隨即出現。If the value of is `true` and the selected font does not support standard ligatures, the default form of the letter is displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property StandardSwashes As Integer
public: abstract property int StandardSwashes { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得標準 Swash 型態的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of a standard swashes form.

value.span: 標準 Swash 形式的索引。

span.span: The index of the standard swashes form.
The default is 0 (zero).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 花飾字是裝飾性字符，會使用精心設計且通常與書寫體相關聯的裝飾。Swashes are decorative glyphs that use elaborate ornamentation often associated with calligraphy. 下列文字顯示 Pescadero 字型的標準和花飾字字符。The following text displays standard and swash glyphs for the Pescadero font. ![使用 OpenType 標準和花飾字字符的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont08.gif "使用 OpenType 標準和花飾字字符的文字")![Text using OpenType standard and swash glyphs](~/add/media/opentypefont08.gif "Text using OpenType standard and swash glyphs") 標準和花飾字字符的範例Example of standard and swash glyphs 花飾字通常用為簡短片語中的裝飾項目，例如事件宣告。Swashes are often used as decorative elements in short phrases such as event announcements. 下列文字使用花飾字強調大寫字母的事件名稱。The following text uses swashes to emphasize the capital letters of the name of the event. ![使用 OpenType 花飾字的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont09.gif "使用 OpenType 花飾字的文字")![Text using OpenType swashes](~/add/media/opentypefont09.gif "Text using OpenType swashes") 花飾字大寫的字母所使用的範例Example of swashes used for capital letters 如果值大於 0 與所選取的字型不支援指定的索引值的標準 swash 形式時，會顯示字母的預設表單。If the value of is greater than 0 and the selected font does not support standard swashes forms at the given index value, the default form of the letter is displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property StylisticAlternates As Integer
public: abstract property int StylisticAlternates { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得樣式替代型態的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of a stylistic alternates form.
The index of the stylistic alternates form.
The default is 0 (zero).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 替代項目是可以取代標準字符的字符。Alternates are glyphs that can be substituted for a standard glyph. OpenType 字型，例如在下列範例中，使用的 Pericles 字型包含可用來建立不同的文字外觀的替代字符。OpenType fonts, such as the Pericles font used in the following examples, contain alternate glyphs that you can use to create different appearances for text. 下列文字顯示 Pericles 字型的標準字符。The following text displays standard glyphs for the Pericles font. ![使用 OpenType 標準字符的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont01.gif "使用 OpenType 標準字符的文字")![Text using OpenType standard glyphs](~/add/media/opentypefont01.gif "Text using OpenType standard glyphs") 一組標準的圖像 （glyph） 的範例Example of a standard set of glyphs Pericles OpenType 字型包含其他字符，提供文體替代圖像 （glyph） 的標準集合。The Pericles OpenType font contains additional glyphs that provide stylistic alternates to the standard set of glyphs. 下列文字顯示文體替代字符。The following text displays stylistic alternate glyphs. ![使用 OpenType 文體替代字符的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont02.gif "使用 OpenType 文體替代字符的文字")![Text using OpenType stylistic alternate glyphs](~/add/media/opentypefont02.gif "Text using OpenType stylistic alternate glyphs") 文體替代字符的範例Example of stylistic alternate glyphs 下列文字顯示數個文體替代字符 Pericles 字型。The following text displays several stylistic alternate glyphs for the Pericles font. ![使用 OpenType 文體替代字符的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont03.gif "使用 OpenType 文體替代字符的文字")![Text using OpenType stylistic alternate glyphs](~/add/media/opentypefont03.gif "Text using OpenType stylistic alternate glyphs") 其他文體替代字符的範例Example of other stylistic alternate glyphs

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property StylisticSet1 As Boolean
public: abstract property bool StylisticSet1 { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，此值會指出是否啟用字型表單的樣式集。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a stylistic set of a font form is enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用字型形式的樣式集，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the stylistic set of the font form is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有些字型包含樣式 variant 圖像 （glyph） 對應至字元集的部分。Some fonts contain stylistic variant glyphs that correspond to portions of a character set. 字符文體集在其設計可能會以視覺化方式雖然、 互動以特定方式，或以其他方式一起運作。Glyphs in stylistic sets may be designed to harmonize visually, interact in particular ways, or work together in other ways.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Variants As FontVariants
public: abstract property System::Windows::FontVariants Variants { System::Windows::FontVariants get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示要使用的標準印制型態的變化。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates a variation of the standard typographic form to be used.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Variant 則類似於 p 或註標的字型型態。Variants are similar to superscript or subscript font forms. 您有字型表單，以包含不同的字符集上標和序數的表單，或之間註標和較差的表單。It is possible for a font form to contain differing glyph sets between superscript and the ordinal form, or between subscript and inferior forms. 屬性可讓您設定的 OpenType 字型的上標和下標值。The property allows you to set superscript and subscript values for an OpenType font. 下列文字顯示上標 Palatino Linotype 字型。The following text displays superscripts for the Palatino Linotype font. ![使用 OpenType 上標的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont14.gif "使用 OpenType 上標的文字")![Text using OpenType superscripts](~/add/media/opentypefont14.gif "Text using OpenType superscripts") 上標的範例Example of superscripts 下列文字顯示下標 Palatino Linotype 字型。The following text displays subscripts for the Palatino Linotype font. ![使用 OpenType 下標的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont15.gif "使用 OpenType 下標的文字")![Text using OpenType subscripts](~/add/media/opentypefont15.gif "Text using OpenType subscripts") 註標的範例Example of subscripts 不支援 variant 的字型可能會有字型形式的演算法近似值。Fonts that do not support variants may have an algorithmic approximation of the font form.
